title: SMNTY Classics: Fighting for Women's Olympic Boxing
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: Fighting for Women's Olympic Boxing
description:
At the 2016 Summer Olympics women's boxing event, all eyes were on U.S.A. phenom Claressa Shields. In this classic episode, Cristen and Caroline share Shields' inspiring backstory and women's boxing's long road to Olympic glory.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
